content: The Jade Lotus Gourd will likely be the first high-level Gourd you find in Black Myth: Wukong. It is of an Epic variety, and it comes with one of the more unique effects when compared with other Gourds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jade_Lotus_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Jade Lotus Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Jade Lotus Gourd will likely be the first high-level Gourd you find in Black Myth: Wukong. It is of an Epic variety, and it comes with one of the more unique effects when compared with other Gourds.
